front.title: Efficient Transmission in Virtual Multi-path TCP

abstract.t: Traditional MPTCP [RFC6824] requires that at least one node in a pair should equipped more than one NIC, and this limits the deployment [RFC6182] of MPTCP. This document proposes the VMPTCP (Virtual Multi-Path TCP) and describes how to build TCP sub-connections in VMPTCP among nodes with just one NIC.
